shared.description: Core theme data, color schemes, and typography.
Color utilities used by theme and components.
Shared interactive primitive for state-aware widgets.
Controlled component primitives for form integration.
Minimal form value supplier interfaces.
Lightweight menu group metadata shared across components.
Style helper for resolving widget/theme/default values.
Border radius helpers used by outlined containers.
Shared timing constants used across animations.
Queue-driven animation controller used by carousel.
Value wrapping helpers for index looping.
Value interpolator used by animated dividers and helpers.
Shared single/range value model used by slider components.
General utility helpers, extensions, and context actions.
Lightweight wrapper for controlled animation curves.
Text input helpers for replacing or inserting text.
Tokenizer helpers for chip-style inputs.
Geometry helpers for optional resolution.
Hidden widget with size-preserving transitions.
Overlay and popover primitives for anchored surfaces.
Hover detection and delayed show helpers.
Hierarchical focus utilities for keyboard navigation.
Basic layout helper for leading/content/trailing rows.
Text modifier helpers for fluent styling.
Icon helper extensions (small, muted).
Minimal localized strings for registry components.
Localization helpers for time, duration, and date parts.
Scroll edge fade helper for scrollable content.
Keyboard shortcut helpers and display handle.
Resizable layout helpers for tables and panels.
Lucide icon font mappings used by controls.
Radix icon font mappings used by menus.
Outlined container primitive with surface blur support.
Sheet overlay context helper.
Focus outline primitive for accessibility states.
Axis alignment helpers used by chat and layout components.
Phone number primitives for form validation and formatting.
Shared helpers from README.md.

components.name: Button
components.description: Shadcn-style button system with variants, toggles, and groups.
postInstall: Optional: wrap a subtree with Theme(data: ThemeData(...), child: ...) to override defaults.

components.name: Clickable
components.description: State-aware gesture surface with hover, focus, and press handling.

components.name: Card
components.description: Card container with optional surface blur variant.

components.name: CardImage
components.description: Interactive card that pairs an image with title/subtitle content.
postInstall: Wrap with ComponentTheme<CardImageTheme> when you need custom scales or spacing.

components.name: Alert
components.description: Flexible alert panels with destructive/resilient styling.
postInstall: Register ComponentTheme<AlertTheme> when you want custom padding, colors, or borders.

components.name: Alpha
components.description: Checkerboard painter for transparency indicators.
postInstall: Paint the checkerboard inside a CustomPaint when you need transparency cues.

components.name: Chat
components.description: Chat bubbles, groups, and tail helpers for conversational layouts.
postInstall: Wrap with ComponentTheme<ChatTheme> to adjust alignment, spacing, and colors.

components.name: Async
components.description: Utility for widgets that work with both synchronous and asynchronous values.

components.name: Autocomplete
components.description: Autocomplete overlay for text inputs with keyboard navigation and theming.

components.name: Collapsible
components.description: Independent sections that toggle their own visibility
postInstall: Provide a ComponentTheme<CollapsibleTheme> to customize padding, iconography, and alignment.

components.name: Focus Outline
components.description: Keyboard focus visualization outline with theming support.
postInstall: Add ComponentTheme<FocusOutlineTheme> to adjust outline bias, borders, or shape.

components.name: Group
components.description: Absolute-position layout surface with explicit offsets and sizes.

components.name: Hidden
components.description: Animated visibility helper with axis-aware size control.
postInstall: Register ComponentTheme<HiddenTheme> to override default curves, duration, or size retention.

components.name: Accordion
components.description: Single-expansion accordion with configurable triggers and theming.
postInstall: Use ComponentTheme<AccordionTheme> when you need custom dividers, icons, or animation curves.

components.name: Badge
components.description: Compact label/status components built on button styles.

components.name: Avatar
components.description: Initials/photo avatar with badge and group support.

components.name: Basic
components.description: Flexible row layout for leading/title/content/trailing sections.

components.name: Chip
components.description: Compact tag-style button with optional leading/trailing widgets.

components.name: Color Utils
components.description: Helper utilities for converting and transforming colors across RGB/HSV/HSL spaces.

components.name: Color History
components.description: Grid + storage helpers that track recently used colors for reuse.
postInstall: Wrap color pickers with RecentColorsScope to share history.

components.name: Color Picker
components.description: HSV/HSL/HEX color picker with popovers, eye dropper, and history controls.
postInstall: Wrap ColorPicker widgets with RecentColorsScope or EyeDropperLayer for full history/sampling.

components.name: Color Input
components.description: Popover/dialog color selector that integrates the picker, history, and eye-dropper tools.
postInstall: Wrap your tree with RecentColorsScope so ColorInput shares history information with pickers.

components.name: HSL Color Slider
components.description: Gradient slider that controls hue, saturation, lightness, or alpha for HSL colors.

components.name: HSV Color Slider
components.description: Gradient slider for HSV color component control (hue, saturation, value, alpha).

components.name: Image
components.description: Placeholder entry preserving legacy image collection support.

components.name: Eye Dropper
components.description: Layer that lets users sample colors from the screen with preview adornments.

components.name: Chip Input
components.description: Inline text input that converts typed tokens into chip widgets with removable buttons and autocomplete hooks.

components.name: Select
components.description: Dropdown/select control with popup menus, grouped items, and keyboard navigation.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Animated checkbox with tri-state support and controllers.

components.name: Divider
components.description: Horizontal and vertical separators with optional label support.

components.name: Dot Indicator
components.description: Animated dot indicator for carousels/steppers with optional tap behavior.

components.name: Circular Progress Indicator
components.description: Determinate/indeterminate spinner with theme overrides and optional animation.

components.name: Linear Progress Indicator
components.description: Determinate/indeterminate progress bar with optional spark effects and theming.

components.name: Locale Utils
components.description: Date/time/duration unit helpers and file size formatting locales.

components.name: Number Ticker
components.description: Animated number display with formatter or custom builder.

components.name: Spinner
components.description: Base spinner helpers for resolving color and size with theming.

components.name: Progress
components.description: Normalized linear progress bar with theme overrides.

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: Skeletonizer helpers with theme-aware config and extensions.

components.name: Command
components.description: Command palette with search, keyboard navigation, and customizable result builders.

components.name: Control
components.description: Controller mixins and helpers for form components.

components.name: Debug
components.description: Debug overlays and container helpers for layout inspection.

components.name: Breadcrumb
components.description: Horizontal breadcrumb trail with arrow/slash separators and overflow handling.

components.name: Code Snippet
components.description: Stylized code container with action slot and theme overrides.

components.name: Carousel
components.description: Interactive carousel with sliding/fading transitions and autoplay controls.

components.name: Calendar
components.description: Date picker and calendar widgets for single, range, and multi selection.

components.name: Date Picker
components.description: Popover/dialog calendar for single-date and range selection.

components.name: File Input
components.description: Utilities for mapping file extensions to icon widgets.
postInstall: Wrap file list widgets with FileIconProvider so FileIconProvider.buildIcon can resolve extensions.

components.name: File Upload
components.description: UI-only drag-drop, tile, and mobile file picker surfaces with upload list management.

components.name: Keyboard Shortcut
components.description: Displays keyboard shortcuts as styled keycaps.

components.name: Fade Scroll
components.description: Edge fade overlays for scrollable content.

components.name: Text Field
components.description: Text input with rich features, autocomplete, and actions.

components.name: Input
components.description: Single-line text input with feature hooks, popovers, and controller integration.

components.name: Input OTP
components.description: Fixed-length OTP input field with clipboard integration, paste handling, and focus management.

components.name: Form Field
components.description: Modal or popover editor field for complex objects.

components.name: Formatted Input
components.description: Low-level formatted-field helpers that sync multiple InputPart segments.

components.name: Form
components.description: Composable form state, validation, and submit helpers.

components.name: Object Input
components.description: Date, time, and duration inputs powered by formatted editors and pickers.

components.name: Outlined Container
components.description: Animated outlined container with theme-aware borders and blur.

components.name: Phone Input
components.description: International phone number input with country selector and formatting helpers.

components.name: Radio Group
components.description: Exclusive selection group with radio items and cards.

components.name: Slider
components.description: Single-value and range sliders with keyboard navigation.

components.name: Multiple Choice
components.description: Choice widgets with single or multiple selection and form integration.

components.name: Item Picker
components.description: Grid/list picker with selection chips, search, and in-place actions.

components.name: Formatter
components.description: Reusable text input formatters (uppercase/lowercase, numeric, math, HEX, etc.) and helpers for selection clipping.

components.name: Switch
components.description: Toggle control for boolean values with themed styling.

components.name: Text Area
components.description: Resizable multi-line text input built on text field primitives.

components.name: Text
components.description: Typography helpers and fluent text modifiers.

components.name: Selectable Text
components.description: Selectable text with themed cursor and selection behavior.

components.name: Scrollbar
components.description: Themeable scrollbar wrapper built on RawScrollbar.

components.name: Scrollable Client
components.description: Two-dimensional scroll surface with builder callbacks for viewport-aware layouts.

components.name: Scroll View Interceptor
components.description: Middle-click drag scroll interceptor for desktop/web.

components.name: More Dots
components.description: Configurable row/column of dots for menu or loading indicators.

components.name: Icon Extensions
components.description: Theme-driven icon size/color helpers and WrappedIcon.

components.name: AlertDialog
components.description: Modal alert dialog with customizable header, content, and actions.

components.name: Dialog
components.description: Modal dialog primitives with alert dialog and overlay handlers.

components.name: Popover
components.description: Anchored overlay surfaces for floating content.

components.name: Overlay
components.description: Shared overlay handler/manager utilities and helpers.

components.name: Popup
components.description: Styled popup container for menus and dropdowns.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: Hover-triggered tooltip overlays with themed containers.

components.name: Refresh Trigger
components.description: Pull-to-refresh wrapper with customizable indicator, extents, and completion animations.

components.name: Tracker
components.description: Horizontal tracker segments with tooltips.

components.name: Hover
components.description: Hover timing helpers plus lightweight state tracking widgets.

components.name: Hover Card
components.description: Hover or long-press triggered popovers for rich previews.

components.name: Toast
components.description: Overlay toast notifications with configurable timing.

components.name: Drawer
components.description: Sliding drawer and sheet overlays with drag support.

components.name: Menu
components.description: Menu primitives, items, and popup container.

components.name: Menubar
components.description: Horizontal desktop-style menubar with dropdown menus and keyboard navigation.

components.name: Media Query Visibility
components.description: Responsive helper that shows primary or alternate content based on width constraints.

components.name: Context Menu
components.description: Desktop-style context menu overlay for editable text and custom actions.
postInstall: Wrap editable text fields with `ContextMenu` to provide native-like action menus.

components.name: Dropdown Menu
components.description: Dropdown menu overlay built on menu primitives.

components.name: Sortable
components.description: Drag-and-drop sorting primitives with drop zones and scrolling.

components.name: Navigation Bar
components.description: Themed navigation bar supporting destinations, overflow, and responsive layout.

components.name: Navigation Menu
components.description: Dropdown-style navigation menu with popovers, groups, and keyboard navigation.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Page navigation controls with skip, previous/next, and ellipsis handling.

components.name: Tabs
components.description: Tabbed navigation primitives with lists and panes.

components.name: Tab Container
components.description: Coordinated tab state manager with customizable builders.

components.name: Tab List
components.description: Horizontal tab header row with active indicator.

components.name: Tab Pane
components.description: Sortable tab strip with integrated content card.

components.name: Switcher
components.description: Swipeable viewport that animates between children along an axis.

components.name: Table
components.description: Resizable table layout with headers, footers, and frozen cells.

components.name: Overflow Marquee
components.description: Smooth marquee for overflowing content with fade edges and looped timing controls.

components.name: Click Detector
components.description: Tracks consecutive taps and exposes click count details.

components.name: Time Picker
components.description: Popover/dialog picker for time and duration values.

components.name: Validated
components.description: Validation wrapper that exposes form error state.

components.name: Stepper
components.description: Multi-step progress with interactive step indicators.

components.name: Steps
components.description: Vertical step list with numbered indicators and connectors.

components.name: Resizable
components.description: Resizable panels with draggable dividers.

components.name: Shadcn Localizations
components.description: Full localization delegate and base translations.

components.name: Shadcn Localizations (EN)
components.description: English translation bundle for ShadcnLocalizations.

components.name: Shadcn Localizations Extensions
components.description: Formatting helpers for localized dates, times, durations, and picker labels.

components.name: Star Rating
components.description: Interactive star rating input with theming support.

components.name: Subfocus
components.description: Hierarchical focus scope for keyboard navigation.

components.name: Swiper
components.description: Swipe-triggered overlays for drawers and sheets.

components.name: Timeline
components.description: Vertical timeline for chronological entries.

components.description: Layout scaffold with headers, footers, and loading indicators.

components.description: Responsive container that snaps to breakpoint widths.

components.name: Tree
components.description: Hierarchical tree view with expandable, selectable nodes.

components.description: Conditional wrapper for preserving widget structure.

components.name: Window
components.description: Desktop-style window system with drag, resize, and snapping.

components.description: Composite export for numeric input helpers.

components.description: Composite export for multiple choice helpers.

components.description: Composite export for RadioCard and RadioGroup.

components.description: Composite export for MultiSelect built on Select.

components.name: App

components.description: Two-dimensional scrollable client and faded viewport utilities.

components.description: Animated border loader wrapper (sweep/linear/radial gradients + tracer mode + circle/custom shapes).
